description: This T-Doll has relatively high durability and is suitable for placement in the front row.
This T-Doll has relatively low durability and is recommended for placement in the back row.
This T-Doll has relatively high DPS and can deal a lot of damage in combat.
This T-Doll has relatively high durability and can take a lot of damage in combat.
This T-Doll has the ability to strengthen allies' durability and/or damage.
This T-Doll can be effective against armored enemies by equipping armor piercing equipment.
This T-Doll can be equipped with night battle equipment to improve accuracy at night.
This T-Doll has high evasion stats and can avoid enemy attacks.
This T-Doll has high armor stats and can effectively reduce non-piercing damage from enemies.
This T-Doll has high damage stats and can deal considerable damage to enemies.
This T-Doll has high rate of fire stats and can deal many hits to enemies.
This T-Doll has high HP stats and can withstand a lot of damage.
This T-Doll has a high crit rate and can often deal critical damage to enemies.
This T-Doll has strong formation buffs that can provide outstanding support to allies.
This T-Doll has high mobility in combat and can easily avoid enemies' telegraphed skills.
This T-Doll has low mobility in combat and cannot easily avoid enemies' telegraphed skills.
This T-Doll can output a great deal of damage for a short period of time upon skill activation.
This T-Doll can output considerable damage over a long period of time upon skill activation.
This T-Doll can deal high damage against a single enemy with normal attacks or skills.
This T-Doll can deal damage against multiple enemies with normal attacks or skills.
This T-Doll can deal damage against enemies within a certain area with normal attacks or skills.
This T-Doll becomes immune to damage for a short period of time upon skill activation.
This T-Doll's skill can stun enemies.
This T-Doll's skill can deal damage that pierces through enemies in a line.
This T-Doll's normal attacks or skills can knockback enemies.
This T-Doll's normal attacks or skills will prioritize back line enemies.
This T-Doll can enhance allies' damage.
This T-Doll can enhance allies' evasion.
This T-Doll can enhance allies' accuracy.
This T-Doll can enhance allies' rate of fire.
This T-Doll can enhance allies' crit rate.
This T-Doll can reduce enemies' damage.
This T-Doll can reduce enemies' evasion.
This T-Doll can reduce enemies' accuracy.
This T-Doll can reduce enemies' rate of fire.
This T-Doll has a powerful nighttime skill and can greatly improve night combat performance.
This T-Doll's skill can cause an enemy to take increased damage from all sources for a short period of time.
This T-Doll has powerful exclusive equipment that can greatly enhance combat performance.
